description: Schema for real-time delivery driver tracking (dev.ocs.order.delivery_tracking@1.0).

name.description: The driver's first name and last initial (e.g., 'Jane D.').

vehicle.description: A short description of the driver's vehicle (e.g., 'Blue Sedan').

status.description: The current stage of the driver's journey.

estimatedArrivalAt.description: The real-time estimated time of arrival at the customer's location.
